rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entry space with built-in storage and an area rug.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-concept living space designed for family gatherings and social interactions, featuring a Bohemian decor aesthetic with mixed textures and vibrant colors.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dining area adjacent to the kitchen, promoting interaction during meals, with modern Bohemian design elements.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A fully-equipped kitchen designed for efficiency and style, incorporating Vastu principles by positioning it in the southeast corner to enhance prosperity.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space with ample natural light from a window on the east side for creativity and productivity, aligning with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Storage and laundry area ensuring efficient workflow and clutter-free spaces.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A luxurious master bedroom with a spacious balcony overlooking the garden, designed following Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom for children or family members, featuring its own balcony for ventilation and natural light.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional guest room with a spacious balcony, designed in the Bohemian style with intricate decor elements.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater space for family entertainment, incorporating acoustic treatments and seating arrangements, positioned away from the bedroom area to minimize sound interference.
